strings.Value: "Still, why do you want to kill this monster? You passed this test back when you were with your tribe, didn't you?"
"Newcomer? You wanted to prove you're good enough to join my group?"
"I'm honored you consider me a part of your new tribe. You're a strong and valiant warrior."
"Are you... embarrassed? I didn't think you were capable of that."
"I don't like this whole 'tribe' idea. I only helped you. You owe me nothing."
{n}Breathing heavily, Amiri stands over the corpse of the fallen monster.{/n} "Whatcha say? See me in action? I almost chopped his head off!"
"That's it! Trial done! Now no one dares say Amiri is weak!" {n}She grins and thrusts her chest out.{/n}
{n}Amiri snorts, and examines herself closely. After a few moments, she grunts.{/n} "Scratches."
{n}Amiri's face reddens.{/n} "Well, yeah. True." {n}She scrapes the floor with her boot.{/n} "I'm in your tribe now. Kind of." {n}Her voice trails off, then falls silent.{/n}
"You know what? If we meet another monster like this â€” I'll kill it too. Not for a test, just... Just that nobody would ever dare say Amiri isn't a warrior!"

{n}Amiri's face reddens.{/n} "Well, not just pups must pass this test. If a man is newcomer to a tribe, he must bring a monster's hide. Proves he's not weak..." {n}Her voice trails off, then falls silent.{/n}

"Just don't start this... that..." {n}Amiri stops, trying to choose the right words.{/n} "Don't talk me about honor and valor. I know already!" {n} She frowns and turns away.{/n} "Still, I owe you thanks. You have a true chief's heart."
{n}Amiri growls low in her throat.{/n} "I don't get embarrassed! I'm a warrior!" {n}She grunts.{/n} "Still, I owe you thanks. You have a true chief's heart."
"What you know?" {n}Amiri shakes her head.{/n} "I don't waste time listen to you!" {n}She turns away and studies the area.{/n}
"You are a valiant warrior. Were there truly fools who doubted your strength?"
"Some did, you know... I spit on them! No one'll dare bark at me now!"
"Yes! A real epic battle, just like the sagas! I won't even have to embellish it for the book!"
